Quick Start Wizard

Basic Info 1

Do you want to use the Quick Start Wizard?

Quick Start Wizard will automatically perform all the required tasks for your account. You only need to input your address, after which the wizard will create 1 Demo place, 1 Demo floor, 1 Demo department, 1 Demo input, 1 Demo output, 1 Demo actionflow and 1 Demo application.

 What's Next? 2

What's next?

Now that you've created your first physical place and other required things, you will probably want to test things out and see how it all works. You can do this by using our pre-built Android Demo App from Google's Play Store or build your own. Please note that the iOS Demo App is on it's way to the Apple's App Store.
